name: CUBE GAME (Demo)
description:
THEME

This demo of an upcoming game, is an 2D platformer where you control a white cube. You're fighting against the enemys from AM I RIGHT? My first game with this theme but they are now much stronger.

CONTROLS

You can go left, right and you can jump with your arrow keys or A, D and the Space bar. You have always an doublejump, that means you can also jump one time in the air.

Special thanks for playing!
